entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
